about.title: about me
about.introText:
Hello and welcome,

I am Dimitar Statev, a full-stack web developer.

I'm passionate about web applications and websites, from the first idea to their implementation in production. My goal is to design functional, intuitive and aesthetic web solutions.

My approach is both technical and creative, based on a solid well-structured code and an ergonomic interface. UX/UI design and aesthetics are at the heart of my work, because a well-designed product leads to a higher user satisfaction.

Always driven by curiosity and the desire to learn, I seek to push my limits and enrich my expertise through working on diverse projects.

about.finalText: If you have an idea or project in mind, do not hesitate to contact me. Together, we can create unique and powerful solutions!

contact.title: contact
contact.text: If you have any opportunity, suggestion or feedback, I would love to hear from you. Please feel free to reach out to me using the contact form or my contact details.
